.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowItemsPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl implements class System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeView, class System.Activities.Presentation.IMultipleDragEnabledCompositeView

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件可用于在设计图面上呈现对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of objects on a design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是基于集合的 Windows Workflow Foundation 设计器基础结构所提供 (WPF) 控件的第二个键 Windows Presentation Foundation。The is the second key Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) control provided by the Windows Workflow Foundation designer infrastructure that is collection-based. 虽然 允许显示和编辑单个包含的元素，但 基于集合、显示可视化效果，并支持编辑属性所提供的项的集合 。While the enables the display and the editing of a single contained element, the is collection-based, displays a visualization, and supports editing of the collection of items provided by the property. 除了允许可视化和编辑集合中包含的多个项目外， `WorkflowItemsPresenter` 还会启用面向集合的操作，例如，在集合中的给定索引处插入项、从集合中删除项以及将项从一个索引移动到另一个索引。In addition to allowing the multiple items contained in the collection to be visualized and edited, the `WorkflowItemsPresenter` also enables collection-oriented actions, such as inserting an item at a given index in the collection, deleting an item from the collection, and moving an item from one index to another. `WorkflowItemsPresenter` 还处理组合操作，例如在各种演示者之间拖动，并允许在单个可撤消的操作中进行编辑。用于 在设计图面上显示单个对象。`WorkflowItemsPresenter` also handles combined actions, such as dragging between the various presenters and allowing that edit to occur in a single, undoable action.Use to present a single object on a design surface. 有关使用的示例 ，请参阅 [自定义复合设计器-工作流项演示者](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-items-presenter) 示例。For an example of the in use, see the [Custom Composite Designers - Workflow Items Presenter](/dotnet/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-items-presenter) sample. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为并行活动生成设计器。The following sample code shows how you can build a designer for the Parallel activity. 注意项的 ModelItem.Branches 绑定。Note the binding to ModelItem.Branches for the Items. ```xaml ```

summary.span: 标识 依赖项属性。

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过提供一个自定义面板模板，您可以自定义和控制所含项的布局。By providing a custom panel template, you can customize and control the layout of the contained items. 默认值 基于垂直方向 `StackPanel` 。The default is based on a vertically oriented `StackPanel`. 作为说明， `ItemsPanel` 活动设计器的 基于水平方向 `StackPanel` 。As an illustration, the `ItemsPanel` for the designer of activities is based on a horizontally oriented `StackPanel`. ## Examples 下面的 XAML 示例显示了 `ItemsPanel` 基于水平方向的活动设计器的 `StackPanel` 。The following example in XAML shows the `ItemsPanel` for the designer of activities that is based on a horizontally oriented `StackPanel`. ```xaml ```
